release_notes:
**New Features:**
• Additional randomization controls in Preferences menu (algorithms + colors, algorithm only, or colors only)
• Add to Favorites button for custom presets, custom color palettes and custom color presets
• Added undo/redo keyboard shortcuts
• Added 6 new color palettes presets

**Improvements:**
• Removed Ctrl/Cmd + W and Ctrl/Cmd + R accelerators to prevent accidentally closing or reloading the app
• Added loading spinner indicator in Batch Process modal for better UX when loading files

**Bug Fixes:**
• Fixed Joy Plot color option switching behavior when Custom Color Preset was selected

download_info.instructions:
Download the latest version from your LemonSqueezy account:
